Uses of Class
gameData.GameStat

  • Packages that use GameStat 
    Package Description
    gameData  
    players  

    • Uses of GameStat in gameData

      Methods in gameData that return GameStat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameStat Field.flyout(GameStat track)
      Updates the GameStat based on a flyout result
      GameStat Field.groundout(LineupManager fielder, HitterData atBat, GameStat track)
      Updates the field and GameStat based on a groundout result Also does the required calculations and updates for a potential double play
      GameStat Field.homer(GameStat track)
      Updates the field and GameStat based on a homerun result
      GameStat Field.popout(GameStat track)
      Updates the GameStat based on a popout result
      GameStat Field.single(HitterData onCard, GameStat track)
      Updates the field and GameStat based on a single result
      GameStat Field.singlePlus(HitterData onCard, GameStat track)
      Updates the field and GameStat based on a single+ result
      GameStat Field.strikeout(GameStat track)
      Updates the GameStat based on a strikeout result
      GameStat Field.triple(HitterData onCard, GameStat track)
      Updates the field and GameStat based on a triple result
      GameStat Field.twoBase(HitterData onCard, GameStat track)
      Updates the field and GameStat based on a double result
      GameStat Field.walk(HitterData onCard, GameStat track)
      Updates the field and GameStat based on a walk result
